input.sentences: the fall was starting off wonderfully .
they were very excited to go to the craft fair .
finally | they looked at the necklaces .
output.sentences: The wonderful smell of autumn has hit the air, and that means fall has finally arrived.
The time of year filled with so much excitement, because soon adorned with pumpkins will be all of the neighbors porches.
Craft fairs this time of year are especially cool because of all the spooky ideas people incorporate into their trades.
Bracelets seem to be a favorite among artists probably because they are so easy to make and include colors of the season.
However we cant forget about necklaces because they are just as easy and cool.
